La torta es trucha
The cake is a lie!

Gold standard for puzzle games, right here. Portal was the first game I played on Steam, and I don't regret my purchase at all. It's not extremely long, especially once you've played the game a couple of times, but don't let that deter you from buying it. The Portal Gun is probably the coolest device I have ever used in a game, ever. The way the game guides you through the basic mechanics feels perfectly natural, the level design is really well thought-out, and the commentary of GladOS throughout makes this game easily one of my favorite games. The story is somewhat minimal, but for this game specifically, it works out in the game's favor. It's rare that I find a puzzle game that feels as engaging as Portal is, in part because the only puzzle game to ever surpass it is none other than Portal 2. Valve knocked it out of the park on this one, and a stellar performance from Ellen McLain  that's topped with Jonathan Coulton's "Still Alive" are just icing on the cake, which is totally real and will definitely be served to you at the completion of the tests. No, there isn't a supercomputer forcing me to say that, why do you ask?
This. This is how you design a game. This is how you tell a story in an interactive medium. And now let's check out the sequel

Absolutely amazing game for its time. Taking the premise of puzzle-platforming by flipping it on its head. The concept, lore, and witty dialogue are also strongsuits that come to play in this game as well if you're into it. So overall, its not just a great game, but an amazing experience to settle into.

|| Juego completado ||
Buen juego, aunque muy corto. Es buena compra para entretenerse un poco mientras haces portales y escuchas a la estúpida máquina que te habla todo el tiempo. Recomiendo complementar esta compra con Portal 2 que es mucho mejor gráficamente y más largo y divertido.

I feel like you owe it to yourself if you bought or built your very own PC to at least try the Portal series out, go get it on sale when they're dirt cheap even, because these truly are something everyone should try and experience.

There's a reason why this series and Half Life are considered some of the best that gaming has to offer. Portal is all about puzzles, dark humour and ageless controls. I was shocked at how well this game has held up all these years. I was also shocked in how short it was compared to its sequel. I took it at a casual pace and finished it in under 3 hours and while it may not be as  big or as funny as its sequel, I think it's a good introduction to PC gaming and to the Portal series.

this is a great game in the portal series, don't play portal 2, it's sequel, first. This one is the one that needs to be completed first for an introduction to the boss fights in the future and how portals and other devices work. With my computer aka a laptop hooked up to a monitor, it lags a little when landing some jumps in test chamber 19. I would like it if the game had a introduction mode where you learn basic mechanics rather than have to go through the portals in test chamber 01 with the timer. The first time I played, I got stuck in the room with the block and the button. I later saw on the portal 2 play through to see if the game was worth downloading, I was glad to see you used buttons to open the blue portal now.

El juego aunque sea ya un clásico, puede dar nuevas sorpresas, así como nuevos retos ya sea en el modo historia o completando los desafíos y mapas que ofrece este juego. Con una jugabilidad divertida y una atmósfera tensa, este juego es un gran clásico si quieres un tiempo de diversión y entretenimiento.
glados should do a cock and ball torture test

Мне нравится эта игра, т.к. создатели думали не только об обычных игроках, но и хардкорщиках: спидранеры, и сами эти челленджи, в которых ты должен пройти каждый уровень: быстрее всего, с меньшим количеством шагов, и меньшим количествм порталов. Также на уровнях есть  вспомогательные объекы для спидрана, на приме: платформа, с которой можно застрейфить на конец уровня (уровень вроде 6, там где нужно энергетическим шаром нужно попасть в специальных приёмник, чтоб начала двигаться платформа.
